boba
  • Forms
  • Typography
  • Labels and Badges
  • Forms
  • Grid
  • Messages
  • Tables
  • Tabs

Forms

Input

Inputs come in all colors









<div>
  <label class="text-green" for="email"> Green </label>
  <input class="green" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

Select

Selects come in all colors









<div>
  <label class="text-green" for="questions"> Green </label>
    <span class="select-icon">
      <select class="green" name="">
        <option value="Option 1"> Action </option>
        <option value="Option 2"> Second Action </option>
        <option value="Option 3"> Something Else </option>
      </select>
    </span>
</div>

Textarea

Textareas come in all colors









<div>
  <label class="text-green" for="email"> Green </label>
  <textarea class="green" name="name" rows="8" cols="80" placeholder="Hey, this is a textarea"> </textarea>
</div>

Styles

Filled








<!-- INPUT -->
<div>
  <label class="text-green" for="email"> Green </label>
  <input class="filled green" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>


<!-- SELECT -->
<div>
  <label class="text-green" for="questions"> Green </label>
  <span class="select-icon">
    <select class="filled green" name="">
      <option value="Option 1"> Action </option>
      <option value="Option 2"> Second Action </option>
      <option value="Option 3"> Something Else </option>
    </select>
  </span>
</div>

<!-- TEXTAREA -->
<div>
  <label class="text-green" for="email"> Green </label>
  <textarea class="filled green" name="name" rows="8" cols="80" placeholder="Hey, this is a textarea"> </textarea>
</div>

Sizes

Forms can be resized











<!-- INPUT -->
<div>
  <label class="" for="email"> Medium Input </label>
  <input class="medium" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>


<!-- SELECT -->
<div>
  <label for="questions"> Medium Select </label>
  <span class="select-icon">
    <select class="medium" name="">
      <option value="Option 1"> Action </option>
      <option value="Option 2"> Second Action </option>
      <option value="Option 3"> Something Else </option>
    </select>
  </span>
</div>

<!-- TEXTAREA -->
<div>
  <label for="email"> Large Textarea </label>
  <textarea class="large" name="name" rows="8" cols="80" placeholder="Hey, this is a textarea"> </textarea>
</div>

States

Forms can be disabled


<!-- INPUT -->
<div>
  <label class="" for="email"> Disabled Input </label>
  <input disabled type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="disabled@email.com">
</div>


<!-- SELECT -->
<div>
  <label for="questions"> Disabled Select </label>
  <span class="select-icon">
    <select disabled name="">
      <option value="Option 1"> Action </option>
      <option value="Option 2"> Second Action </option>
      <option value="Option 3"> Something Else </option>
    </select>
  </span>
</div>

<!-- TEXTAREA -->
<div>
  <label for="email"> Disabled Textarea </label>
  <textarea disabled name="name" rows="8" cols="80" placeholder="Hey, this is a textarea"> </textarea>
</div>
